document_data.name: Verik
document_data.mainbody: '''Verik''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the [[Moonsea]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Verik was a very good liar and spy.
document_data.History:
Verik was part of a Cult traditionalist faction under the wizard [[Ixas]].

In 1489 DR, he was sent to a small village on a isle not too far from [[Phlan]], where a great [[fiend]]ish power was hidden. He infiltrated the village while acting as a madman. He also befriended [[Elisande]]. When an adventuring party arrived in the village, to investigate rumors of [[dracolich]]es and [[ghost]] ships, they may have discovered and killed him.{{Cite adventurers league/Shadows over the Moonsea|17}}
